TI_TEXT.P: Лека грундирана хартия и ръчно произвеждана хартия
Papel kraft y papel para trabajos artísticos
Papier na umeleckú tlač a modelársky papier

TITLE.P: YPO — 000838 Matt Poster, Sugar, Play and Display Paper

SHORT_DESCR.P: YPO are looking for providers to be appointed onto a framework agreement for the provision of Matt Poster, Sugar, Play and Display Papers for use primarily in the education market. The Framework is designed to meet the needs of YPO by establishing an agreement for providers to deliver stock into YPO’s distribution centre in Wakefield, West Yorkshire and on a direct basis whereby the end customer places the order with YPO and YPO places the order with the provider but the provider delivers direct to the end customer.
High Level Evaluation Criteria for Acceptance of Providers onto the Framework:
Lots 1-3 Only.
Cost: 35 %.
Quality: 45 %.
Delivery and Customer Service: 15 %.
Added Value: 5 %.
Lots 4-16 Only.
Cost: 40 %.
Quality: 40 %.
Delivery and Customer Service: 15 %.
Added Value: 5 %.
Matt coated poster paper. Finished weight with coating to be a minimum of 80gsm. Various colours.

RENEWAL_DESCR.P: There is a possibility that this framework will be subject to renewal after 3.5 years from the commencement date.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: The Framework Agreement will cover the period from 1st September 2018 until 31st August 2020 with two options to extend for an additional 12 months (subject to an annual review, incorporating price negotiations and KPI performance) The first decision to extend the contract period will be taken by the end of April 2020.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Fluorescent poser paper, matt coated surface, finished paper weight to be a minimum of 80gsm.

SUITABILITY.P: Organisations must ensure that they are not in breach of any of the mandatory or discretionary exclusions contained in Regulation 57 of the Public Contracts Regulations 2015. Please refer to the Tender Documentation/ Online Tender located on our E-Procurement system. The web address can be found under “Procurement Documents” in “Communication” section in this notice.

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: Please refer to the Framework Agreement Terms and Conditions located on our E-Procurement system. The web address can be found under Procurement Documents in “Communication” Section in this notice.

ESTIMATED_TIMING.P: There is a possibility that this framework will be subject to renewal after 3.5 years from the commencement date.

INFO_ADD.P: YPO are purchasing on the behalf of other Contracting Authorities. Please see the below link for details: https://www.ypo.co.uk/about/customers/ojeu-permissible-users.aspx

YPO will incorporate a standstill period at the point of notification of the award of the contract is provided to all bidders. The standstill period will be for a minimum of 10 calendar days, and provides time for unsuccessful tenderers to challenge the award decision before the contract is entered into. The Public Contracts Regulations 2015 provide for aggrieved parties who have been harmed or are at risk of harm by a breach of the rules to take action in the High Court (England, Wales and Northern Ireland).

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: High Court of England and Wales
